effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into vaporeon, a lombre into ludicolo, a panpour into simipour, a poliwhirl into poliwrath, a shellder into cloyster, or a staryu into starmie.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.

flavor_text_entries.text: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is the blue of a pool of clear water.
